description: This module revolves around self-directed learning appropriate to each studentâ€™s career trajectory through one-to-one mentoring. The module consolidates and hones technical, musical and professional skills appropriate to a variety of career contexts. Through developing independence, self-reflection, and flexibility, preparing students to deal with professional expectations and demands with confidence, and navigate within the constantly evolving cultural landscape.
title: Professional Practices in Music
prerequisite: This module is restricted to students enrolled in the Master of Music Leadership degree programme.
